SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT307
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Advice/Instruction of a Third Party FX Deal
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by a fund manager to a custodian bank as an advice of/instruction to settle a third party foreign exchange deal.
The definition of third party must be agreed up front between the fund manager and the custodian relative to deals executed by the custodians' treasury area on behalf of the fund manager.
It is used to:
a) provide details about a new deal
b) provide a settlement notification
c) cancel a previously sent message.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: This is a request to cancel a previously sent instruction.

Validation.Comment: Sub-function, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: This message is being sent as a copy, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: The message is being sent as a copy, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: The message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is APER, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: NOPE
Code.Description: The instruction is for the partial or final closing of a forward currency contract.

Code.Name: OPEF
Code.Description: The instruction is for the opening of a forward currency contract.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is CRTR, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AFWD
Code.Description: Forward Foreign Exchange. The FX is a forward/hedge executed for a future date at a set price. The contract is opened and closed for the same value date resulting in a gain or loss. The result can be settled by netting the local base or both currencies, or by settling the gross/principal amount.

Code.Name: ASET
Code.Description: Settlement contract. The FX is a physical settlement in which both the buy and sell currencies will move on the settlement (value) day.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is NEGR, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: GRSC
Code.Description: The contract will be settled gross.

Code.Name: NETC
Code.Description: The contract will be settled net.

Code.Name: UNKN
Code.Description: It is unknown whether the contract will be settled net or gross.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is PAFI, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: FINA
Code.Description: Final settlement. This is the final close of a forward currency contract.

Code.Name: PAIN
Code.Description: Partial settlement. This is the partial close of a forward currency contract.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
First Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Second Currency Code must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

If Qualifier is CDEA, INTE or ACCW, Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information on BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations. (Error code(s): C05) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
When Qualifier is GALO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
When Qualifier is GALO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

If Qualifier is CDEA, INTE or ACCW, Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information on BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations. (Error code(s): C05) .
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, the presence of the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) and the presence of the Net Settlement Indicator (field :22H::NEGR) depend on the Contract Type (field :22H::CRTR) (Error code(s): C60)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) and the presence of the Net Settlement Indicator (field :22H::NEGR) depend on the Contract Type (field :22H::CRTR)"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In sequence A, the presence of the Close Indicator (field :22H::PAFI) depends on the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) (Error code(s): C61)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of the Close Indicator (field :22H::PAFI) depends on the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER)"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 The presence of sequence C depends on the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) (Error code(s): C62)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence C depends on the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER)"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In sequence A, the presence of the qualifier UNKN in the Net Settlement Indicator (field :22H::NEGR//UNKN) depends on the content of the Contract Type (field :22H::CRTR), of the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) and of the Close Indicator (field :22H::PAFI) (Error code(s): C63)
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "ASET", Implies(A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0, A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator != "UNKN"), Implies((A[0].F22a[0].APER.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].APER[0].Indicator == "NOPE" && A[0].F22a[0].PAFI.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].PAFI[0].Indicator == "FINA"), A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator != "UNKN"))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of the qualifier UNKN in the Net Settlement Indicator (field :22H::NEGR//UNKN) depends on the content of the Contract Type (field :22H::CRTR), of the Open Indicator (field :22H::APER) and of the Close Indicator (field :22H::PAFI)"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 The presence of sequence D depends on the value of field 22H Indicator (Error code(s): C64)
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "ASET", Implies((A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size == 0 || A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator == "GRSC"), D.$size == 0), If(A[0].F22a[0].APER.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].APER[0].Indicator == "OPEF" && A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0 && In(A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator, "NETC", "GRSC", "UNKN"), D.$size == 0, If(A[0].F22a[0].PAFI.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].PAFI[0].Indicator == "PAIN" && A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0 && In(A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator, "NETC", "GRSC", "UNKN"), D.$size == 0, If(A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator == "NETC", D.$size > 0, Implies(A[0].F22a[0].NEGR.$size > 0 && A[0].F22a[0].NEGR[0].Indicator == "GRSC", D.$size == 0)))))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence D depends on the value of field 22H Indicator"

fieldvalidation.name: C6-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C6-1 The field :19B::BUYE cannot appear more than once in the message(Error code(s): E83)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The field :19B::BUYE cannot appear more than once in the message "

fieldvalidation.comment: C6-2 The field :19B::SELL cannot appear more than once in the message(Error code(s): E83)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The field :19B::SELL cannot appear more than once in the message "

fieldvalidation.comment: C6-3 The field :95a::CDEA cannot appear more than once in the message(Error code(s): E83)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The field :95a::CDEA cannot appear more than once in the message "

fieldvalidation.comment: C6-5 The field :95a::ACCW cannot appear more than once in the message (Error code(s): E83)

fieldvalidation.comment: C6-6 The field :95a::BENM cannot appear more than once in the message (Error code(s): E83)

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 Repetitive subsequence B3 FX Settlement Details must be present exactly twice in the message (Error code(s): E90).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Repetitive subsequence B3 FX Settlement Details must be present exactly twice in the message"

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 In each occurrence of sequence B3, the presence of the repetitive subsequence B3a Cash Parties depends on the content of the Net Settlement Indicator (:22H::NEGR), (Error code(s): E91)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B3, the presence of the repetitive subsequence B3a Cash Parties depends on the content of the Net Settlement Indicator (:22H::NEGR)"

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 In each occurrence of Seq. B3, the presence of the different parties (field 95a) in Sequence B3a depends on the content of field 19B in sequence B3 (Error code(s): E92)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Seq. B3, the presence of the different parties (field 95a) in Sequence B3a depends on the content of field 19B in sequence B3"

fieldvalidation.name: C10-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C10-1 In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::CDEA cannot appear more than once(Error code(s): E84)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::CDEA cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C10-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C10-2 In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::INTE cannot appear more than once(Error code(s): E84)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::INTE cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C10-3

fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::ACCW cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C10-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C10-4 In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::BENM cannot appear more than once(Error code(s): E84)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence B3, the party field :95a::BENM cannot appear more than once"
